Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '"For all will... be well..."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{3: 'You open your eyes to find yourself in a corridor.'}

{3: 'Looking at the furnishings, this seems to be an abandoned church. Most of the paint is peeled off, giving a discordant feeling to the room. A faint song, sung by children, can be heard from beyond the wall.'}
{3: 'You move through the corridor, and hear some people speaking at the end of it.'}
{2: 'Boy?', 3: 'I already ate all of it! What do you want me to do?'}
{2: 'Girl?', 3: 'Yeah! Whaddya want?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nun?', 3: 'No one to blame but your own gullible selves.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Please... My sister and I... won't be able to live through this winter...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna stands out in the crowd of children, but she does not seem to notice.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Lucia... This time, I can protect you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She mumbles, slowly raising the dagger in her hand.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If I do this, then all of this wouldn't have happened.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna, come to yourself!', 3: '27'}
{3: 'Hearing someone call for her, she turns over stiffly. Seeing that it is you, she reveals an icy smirk.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '【kuroname】... Do you not realize that I am Luna herself?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna, your mind is being corrupted!', 3: '34', 4: 'You knew who I was this whole time?', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Not from the beginning... but not too late, hm?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(...The further into her mind, the more she remembers.)', 3: '997'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If I kill you here—kill everyone here—I can remove my weakness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If I do so, I'll become the most formidable agent. I can protect Lucia and live with her in a new world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That will cause your M.I.N.D. to collapse!', 3: '995'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I don't believe in you! I don't believe in anyone!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I paid too much for believing in others... I only trust my own hands.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If I didn\'t believe in Gabriel... If Shome\'s fantasies were real... If I didn\'t kill that "sister" of mine in the landfill...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If only I went through the Construct modification successfully... If only I managed to protect my sister... If only I never lent out the food we saved for winter...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "...If only it weren't for you messing it all up!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I'm just trying to go back, and destroy it all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'This is my dream.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But... can Constructs dream...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I don't even remember the dreams in my childhood.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If Ascendants have dreams, they must be like mine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Dark... sinister... and foul...', 4: '1'}
{2: '(The Ascnet is turning her...)', 3: '987', 4: '(Her emotions are getting muddled...)', 5: '987'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I know of people who held on to their humanity... even under more horrific circumstances than mine...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But that is not who I am.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Every step I've taken, is my very own decision.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Just like how you weren't a part of my life—whatever you do now, is pointless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I am the Ascension Network agent, Luna, and... forever will be.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She trembles. A certain human holds onto her hand, and the dagger falls from her grip. The children around scream at her, calling her a monster, and run away.'}
{2: "...I don't know what's right.", 3: '57'}
{2: "But I know that... this is what I'd do.", 3: '58'}
{3: 'The human hugs the pure white Construct, the arms firm and reassuring like an anchor.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Dreams... shouldn't be like this.", 3: '60'}
{2: "This wouldn't happen in the real world.", 3: '64'}
{2: "I don't agree, nor understand why you'd do this.", 3: '65'}
{2: 'But I do feel... your unease.', 3: '66'}
{3: '—And how lost you are, and what you have been through, the betrayals you faced... Everything.'}
{3: 'You know full well that when you wake from this dream, you will both return to reality—return to being enemies, return to your duties... But...'}
{2: 'At the very least, for you right now...', 3: '69'}
{2: 'You deserve a better dream.', 3: '70'}
{3: 'Wind tunnels through the room. It envelops the figure like a warm veil and reshuffles the world.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory56.jpg'}
{3: "When the gale finally comes to rest, the room has become a simple but cozy children's room."}
{2: "Everything's changed.", 3: '75'}
{3: 'The weight of the girl presses on your shoulders, as if she has suddenly taken on a real form.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I see... So this is how it... feels.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Under the glimmering light of the small room, Luna's thin lips seem to have curled into a faint smile on her pale face."}
{2: "You're safe now.", 3: '82', 4: 'Leave this to me.', 5: '82'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I feel like... I've heard this before.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Yep. You're safe now.", 3: '84'}
{2: "No need to worry. You won't be harmed.", 3: '86'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Sister... If only I could... stay asleep forever in this dream.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Stay by my side... until I fall asleep...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The dreamlike girl before you murmurs. Her usual calm, collected look resurfaces.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You leave the night light on the bed table. Finally, you manage to give her the present.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A wave of fatigue washes over you, and you feel your signal connection grow clearer and clearer.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '"Let us sing, for all will be well."'}
{3: '"Blossoming flowers and sea-washed sand castles, milk and warm bread and birch tinder that crackles."'}
